content:
* Pay with Miles/Mix Miles and Cash (project)
* KrisFlyer (membership program)
* Singaporeair.com (website)
* Commercial ticket (travel option)
* Ancillaries (additional services)
* KF miles (currency)
* Booking classes (seat availability)
* SIA (airline)
* Expiry (mile expiration)
* Minimum number of miles (threshold for payment)
* Conversion rate (exchange rate from SGD to KF miles)
* Maximum number of miles (limit for payment)
* Taxes and surcharges (additional fees)
* Nominees (designated individuals)
* RGN (acronym for nominee)
* Travel agent (middleman)
* Foreign currency (non-SGD currency)
* IATA (International Air Transport Association)
* PPS Value (rewards program)
* Elite miles (membership status)
* KF miles (currency)
* PNR (booking reference number)
* SIA operated flights (flights operated by SIA)
* Codeshare flights (flights operated by another airline but marketed by SIA)
